result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Zachary J. Murphy

records.addlTxt: Marathon County Victim Waiver of No Contact Bond Condition- A.F.
Pre-trial conference on November 9, 2022 at 11:10 am.

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 3:26 p.m. 
INCLUDES: 22CM665, 22CM669.
State appears by ADA Alex Lech.  Defendant appears in person, pro se.

Date and time set for Warrant Quash. VRCW.  

COURT QUASHES WARRANT. 

COURT ORDERS: $1,000.00 signature bond reinstated.

CONDITIONS: 
- Same as previously ordered. 

DATES:
PTC W/JA: 11/9/22 @ 11:10 a.m. 


Adjourned: 3:30 p.m.
warrant is to include case 22CM669 (not listed on warrant)

Clerk: Heather.
Case Called: 2:04 p.m. 
INCLUDES: 22CM665, 22CM669.
State appears by ADA Rory McGarry in person. Defendant FAILS to appear.
VRCW.

COURT notes there was a note from the Defendant's mother indicating the Defendant was not going to show up today, due to Defendant being hospitalized.
ADA McGarry has reviewed the letter and has nothing to add. 
ADA McGarry requests BW and bond forfeiture hearing.
COURT GRANTS BW $300.00 and declines to set a bond forfeiture hearing at this time.

Adjourned: 2:07 p.m.
warrant is to include case 22CM669 (not listed on warrant)
from Defendant's Mother regarding 09/19/22 Review Hearing/Defendant location status- stj
Vacated warrant on record later in the day
Review hearing on September 19, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Case Called: 10:53 a.m.
Clerk Heather.
INCLUDES: 22CM665, 22CM669.
State appears by ADA Alex Lech; Defendant FAILS to appear;

ADA Lech requests bench warrant and judgment on bond;

COURT forfeits $100.00 of the bond and authorizes $250.00 bench warrant (22CM665);

Adjourned: 10:58 a.m.

CASE RECALLED:
Same appearances. 

COURT has reviewed the record and notes the BFH should not have been set, also notes Defendant did not sign bond that had today's notice.
COURT vacates the warrant and the judgment of bond.

DATES:
RH: 9/19/22 @ 2:00 p.m. 

Adjourned: 11:26 a.m.

Includes 22CM665 and 22CM669. No contact with victim(s): No direct or indirect contact with A.C.F. or J.R.B. or their residence. Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Police escort to retrieve personal property from the residence (Rothschild PD). Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.

Clerk: Amanda.
Case called at 2:58 pm.
INCLUDES: 22CM665 and 22CM669. 
State appears by ADA Hannah Boeck. Defendant appears, pro se
Date and Time set for IA; VRCW. 

COURT QUASHES WARRANT.

COURT ORDERS: $1,000 signature bond - CONDITIONS: Same conditions. 


>>FUTURE DATES: 
BFH: 9/2 at 10. 

UPdated number:
715-453-2042

Adj: 2:59 pm.
ADA Barnett appears; Deft does not appear; Hearing set w/Branch 5 on August 11th @ 2:45 pm.

Case called: 9:52 a.m. 
Clerk: Heather.      
Defendant FAILS to appear.


Due to non appearance, COURT denies request for counsel.

Adj 9:52 a.m.

Indigency hearing on July 18, 2022 at 09:30 am.

Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney. Police escort to retrieve personal property from the residence (Rothschild PD). Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:06 p.m.

State appears by ADA Lacey Coonen for ADA Jonathan Barnett.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, with Atty Paige Metzman, in person.

Date and time set for initial appearance. VRCW.  
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 

PLEA: NOT GUILTY on CM's

- Police escort to retrieve personal property from the residence (Rothschild PD). 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.
